name: AnyDesk Silent Installation
description: AnyDesk Remote Desktop silent installation can be used by attacker to gain remote access.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*\-\-install* AND process.command_line:*\-\-start\-with\-win* AND process.command_line:*\-\-silent*)`
